control (if/else, loops)
lists (data structure)
dictionaries (data structure)
higher order functions and/or lambdas
environment diagrams (drawing diagrams to identify execution order)
trees (data structure)
linked lists (data structure)
object oriented programming (classes, objects, and inheritance)
recursion (including self reference)
iterators and/or generators 
time complexity (big O notation)
scheme (programming language)
structured query language (SQL)
exceptions (try/except)
